text: Hmm. Are these two well known Kardashian ex ’ s bonding now that they are single? New pictures show that Tyga and Scott Disick partied the night away together and seemed closer than ever while doing so. Tyga, 27, and Scott Disick, 33, have more than one thing in common, but most recently is their splits from Kardashian women. Instead of sitting at home wallowing, Tyga and Scott, who are rumored to have their own reality series in the works, spent an entire night out in West Hollywood, California on Tuesday, April 25.
